When connecting to a MySQL database in the DSE, the following message appeared in the log. The URL associated with this database was:

jdbc:mysql://localhost:3307/?user=root&password=dba

This does not happen if the connection uses the following URL:

jdbc:mysql://localhost/?user=root&password=dba

Fixed by checking the index more carefully in the default ServerIdentifier class. To enable customization of the url parsing algorithm, ServerIdentifier construction is put into DBHelper, so that vendor plugins can choose to override.
